hero.headline: Empowering Sustainable Agriculture Across ECOWAS
hero.subheadline: Connecting ECOWAS countries with agricultural insights for growth and resilience.

agricInput.title: Agric Input
agricInput.desc: Explore data on fertilizers, seeds, and pesticides to optimize agricultural productivity across ECOWAS.

agroHydro.title: Agro-hydro-meteorology
agroHydro.desc: Access weather and hydrological insights to support climate-smart farming practices.

agricProduction.title: Agricultural Production
agricProduction.desc: Analyze crop yields and production trends to enhance food security in the region.

agricMarket.title: Agricultural Market
agricMarket.desc: Track market prices and trade data to empower farmers and stakeholders.

foodStocks.title: Food Stocks
foodStocks.desc: Monitor food reserves to ensure stability and preparedness for shortages.

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.desc: Understand nutritional outcomes to promote healthier diets and food systems.

livestock.title: Livestock
livestock.desc: Dive into livestock production and health data to boost animal husbandry.

fishery.title: Fishery
fishery.desc: Discover fishery production and sustainability metrics for coastal communities.

aquaculture.title: Aquaculture
aquaculture.desc: Learn about aquaculture practices to enhance fish farming and food supply.

research.title: Agric Research Results
research.desc: Access cutting-edge research to drive innovation in agriculture.

macro.title: Macroeconomics Indices
macro.desc: Examine economic indicators impacting agriculture for informed policy-making.

about.title: Naturally grown food by passionate farmers.
about.description: ECOAGRIS connects ECOWAS countries through agricultural data, empowering stakeholders with insights for better decision-making.
about.mission: Our Mission is to empower ECOWAS agricultural stakeholders with data-driven insights to enhance productivity, sustainability, and resilience in livestock and crop systems.
about.vision: Thriving, data-empowered agricultural landscape across ECOWAS, where innovative analytics drive equitable growth, environmental stewardship, and food sovereignty for all.

keyData.title: Key Data Insights Across ECOWAS
keyData.subtitle: Discover agricultural trends driving growth, sustainability, and resilience.

flagGrid.title: Explore ECOWAS Member Countries
flagGrid.description: Select a country to explore agricultural data and insights.

challenges.title: Addressing Agricultural Challenges in ECOWAS
challenges.subtitle: Innovation and data are crucial to overcoming the pressing agricultural challenges faced by ECOWAS countries. At ECOAGRIS, we are committed to delivering practical solutions for a sustainable future.

climateChange.title: Climate Change
climateChange.desc: Climate change affects crop yields, water availability, and farming conditions across the ECOWAS region.

dataAccess.title: Limited Access to Data
dataAccess.desc: Many farmers lack access to up-to-date agricultural data that could help them make informed decisions.

infrastructure.title: Poor Infrastructure
infrastructure.desc: Inadequate infrastructure hinders efficient transportation and distribution of agricultural products.

lowProductivity.title: Low Productivity
lowProductivity.desc: Many regions face stagnant or low agricultural productivity due to outdated farming practices and lack of innovation.

climateSmart.title: Climate-Smart Agriculture
climateSmart.desc: Implementing climate-smart agriculture practices that improve resilience to climate change and boost productivity.

dataTransparency.title: Data Transparency
dataTransparency.desc: Providing farmers with transparent, accurate, and timely data to make better decisions about crops, weather, and resources.

resourceOptimization.title: Resource Optimization
resourceOptimization.desc: Optimizing the use of resources such as water, fertilizers, and land to improve yield efficiency and sustainability.

regionalCollaboration.title: Regional Collaboration
regionalCollaboration.desc: Promoting regional collaboration for shared agricultural knowledge, infrastructure, and policy development to enhance productivity.

collaborators.title: Our Partners and Collaborators
collaborators.description: ECOAGRIS thrives on collaboration. Our partners — from ECOWAS institutions to international organizations — work together to strengthen food systems, enhance data reliability, and promote sustainable agricultural development across West Africa.

contact.title: Get Involved with ECOAGRIS
contact.subtitle: Join our growing network of agricultural innovators, policymakers, and researchers working to strengthen food security across ECOWAS.
contact.success: Message sent successfully! We’ll get back to you soon.
contact.joinDesc: Stay connected with ECOAGRIS for insights, updates, and opportunities across ECOWAS.

footer.about: Empowering Agricultural Intelligence Across ECOWAS. ECOAGRIS connects ECOWAS countries through smart agricultural data systems that drive evidence-based decision-making and regional food security.
